SELECT wc.WC_ID AS wcId, wc.WC_NAME AS wcName, wc.WC_NUM AS wcNum, e.ELECTRICITY_ID AS electricityId, e.`YEAR`, e.`MONTH`, e.ACTUAL_AMOUNT AS actualAmount, e.UNIT_PRICE AS unitPrice, e.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS totalAmount, e.CREATE_DATE AS createDate, e.REC_DATE AS recDate, e.TYPE FROM cy_electricity AS e LEFT JOIN p_wc_electricity AS we ON(we.ELECTRICITY_ID=e.ELECTRICITY_ID) LEFT JOIN cy_wc AS wc ON(wc.WC_ID=we.WC_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND wc.WC_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{electricity.wcName},'%')
AND wc.WC_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{electricity.wcNum},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(e.`YEAR`, #{electricity.year})
AND FIND_IN_SET(e.`MONTH`, #{electricity.month})
AND e.CREATE_DATE >= #{electricity.createTimeFrom}
AND e.CREATE_DATE <= #{electricity.createTimeTo}
